name: TC1392-01 - 'Learned' should increased by 1 after leaving a “Yes” mark.
description: LMS-1392 Логика Yes 3. https://app.qase.io/plan/LMS/1?case=1392Нажать Yes. При завершении стопки количество Learned увеличивается на 1.

Click 'Yes' button on dialog window if visible.
Assert that Learned cards amount before (0) increased by 1 (0).
